content.rendered:
Dr. Shyamsundar Mohapatra International Foundation

About Us

Dr. shyamsundar Mohapatra International Foundation was established as a non profit organization in 2009.

The soul aims and objectives of the foundation is to carry forward the vision and ideals of Dr. S.S Mohapatra (Former member of Parliament, Loksabha and Rajyasabha, Secretary general of the all India Congress Committee (I) and distinguished son of India. As such the foundation sent letters to various office friends worldwide to apprise them about the foundation to propagate the visions of Dr. S.S Mohapatra. Many of his admirers, Friends and Colleagues in high places around the world approved to become patrons of the foundation, Some names are given below…..

USA

  • Dr. Honki Kim(Ambassador to United Nations)
  • Dr. Rebecca N. Mbuhdlancey
  • Mr. Sang Jin Choi
  • Mr. Albert Kim(Hawaii)

ENGLAND

  • Lord Swaraj Paul(MP)
  • Virendra Sharma(MP)
  • Peter Smith (Mayor Walsall)
  • Amarjeet Singh Kharaud

INDIA

  • Mr. Prasanna Patsani (MP)
  • Mr. Prasanna Acarya (MP)
  • Mr. Madhusudan Doria (RAJ)
  • Mr. Nathu Singh Gurjar (Former minister, Raj)
  • Mr. Balabhadra Majhi (Former minister of Odisha)
  • Mr. Lalit Mansingh (Former foreign secretary, India)

NORWAY

  • Rector Ragner Naess

SOUTH KOREA

  • Professor Sungho Kang
  • Dr. Byung Kong Hwang
  • Dr. Chung Won Choue (President, World taekwando federation)

GERMANY

  • Mr. Hack Bae Kim
  • Mr. Sanak Mohapatra (Scientist)
  • Dr. Richa Das

AUSTRALIA

  • Dr. Dae Wom Kam
  • Mr. Joseph Ahm

JAPAN

  • Dr. DaisakuIkeda (Soka University)
  • Dr. NobukoMori
  • Dr. ChanFupo
  • Mr. Yoshero Kitamoto
  • Mr. KatsuhikoFujiwara (Teikyo University)

TAIWAN

  • Mr. Chan Sui Layng
  • Mr. Kao peng Hsiang

PHILIPPINES

  • Dr. Manuel Punjal (Former Minister)
  • Dr. Vernard Magno karganila

TUVALU

  • Mr. Lacoba Iteali (Governor general)

NICARAGUA

  • Dr. Mendia Occompo

HONGKONG

  • Dr. Alex Lee
  • Dr. Kong Shiu Loon

CHINA

  • Mr. Zhang Peng
  • Mr. Zhou Gang (Former Ambassador)
  • Dr. Jin Che
  • Professor Jin Tianyi

MALAYSIA

  • Mr.G. Jaymarn raja
  • Dr. Choong Kam Kow

SAKHA REPUBLIC

  • Dr. Alexander Kim (Chairman Constitutional Court)

MACAU

  • Mr. Steven K. W. Siu

NEPAL

  • Mrs. Ang Maya Sherpa
  • Mr. Ang Thhering Lama

COLUMBIA

  • Dr. Fransinco Bermudez

KENYA

  • Rev. Alawnga Silvanus Malaho

NIGERIA

  • Mr. Waheed Olanlesi
  • Mr. Adekunle Ibidapo Adewale

BULGERIA

  • Ms. Svetlana Meto Dieva

RUSSIA

  • Mr. Voyche Vskiy Victor

TAIPEI

  • Mr. Hsu Hung Shu mei
  • Mr. Chen Yen Chao

UGANADA

  • Mr. George ssen tongo

THAILAND

  • PornChai Mong Khonvanit (Siam University)
  • Mr. Thana Vadee boonlu

VIETNAM

  • Mr. Kim Young Sin
  • Mr. Sim Sang Joom

PAKISTAN

  • Mr. Moazzam Wattoo (MP)

Offices has been set up in India,England,United States,Argentina, South Korea and Japan to carry forward the vision and ideals of Dr. S.S Mohapatra.

AND MANY MORE...
